entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
